instructions.step: Bring 250ml water and 100g caster sugar to the boil, stirring until the sugar dissolves. Set aside to cool
Blend 1 large scoop of mango sorbet,Â 50mll orange juice, 50ml tequila and 1 tsp sugar syrup until smooth.
Swirl the raspberry coulis inside a glass. Add the mango mixture and garnish with a raspberry and a mint leaf.
